column2: Nobody gets out of here alive. Not legally, anyway.
column3: Les circonscriptions électorales sont délibérément modifiées à des fins électorales, ce qui signifie que les voix pour le parti dirigeant comptent davantage. Le parti dirigeant peut recourir au charcutage électoral pour que la population vote pour lui.
column4: Wahlkreise oder -bezirke werden für Wahlen nach Belieben modifiziert. Als Resultat daraus zählen die Stimmen für die Regierungspartei mehr. Die Regierungspartei kann Wahlkreisschiebungen einsetzen, um die Bevölkerung dazu zu bewegen, für sie zu stimmen.
column6: Se modifican de manera deliberada los distritos o las fronteras electorales con fines interesados, lo que significa que los votos para el partido gobernante tienen más valor. El partido gobernante puede utilizar esta práctica para conseguir que la gente lo vote.

column2: The government only encourages immigrants from accepted and primary cultures.
column3: Le vote des électeurs n'est pas confidentiel. Le parti dirigeant sait pour qui vote la population et peut faire pression pour l'inciter à voter pour lui.
column4: Die Entscheidungen der Wähler sind nicht vertraulich. Die Regierungspartei weiß, wen die Bevölkerung wählt und kann so Druck auf die Bevölkerung ausüben, für sie zu stimmen.
column6: El voto no es secreto. El partido gobernante sabe a quién vota la gente y puede presionar a la población con fines electorales.

column2: Immigration is pay-your-way, allowing only wealthy individuals into the country.
column3: Le vote des électeurs n'est pas confidentiel. Le parti dirigeant sait pour qui vote la population et peut faire pression pour l'inciter à voter pour lui.
column4: Die Entscheidungen der Wähler sind nicht vertraulich. Die Regierungspartei weiß, wen die Bevölkerung wählt und kann so Druck auf die Bevölkerung ausüben, für sie zu stimmen.
column6: El voto no es secreto. El partido gobernante sabe a quién vota la gente y puede presionar a la población con fines electorales.

column2: The government sets quotas and accepts only educated immigrants.
column3: Le vote des électeurs n'est pas confidentiel. Le parti dirigeant sait pour qui vote la population et peut faire pression pour l'inciter à voter pour lui.
column4: Die Entscheidungen der Wähler sind nicht vertraulich. Die Regierungspartei weiß, wen die Bevölkerung wählt und kann so Druck auf die Bevölkerung ausüben, für sie zu stimmen.
column6: El voto no es secreto. El partido gobernante sabe a quién vota la gente y puede presionar a la población con fines electorales.

column2: Our country accepts all comers with open arms.
column3: Le vote des électeurs est confidentiel pour ne pas qu'ils soient influencés (corruption ou intimidation). Le parti dirigeant ne peut pas affecter le vote des électeurs.
column4: Die Entscheidungen der Wähler werden vertraulich behandelt, um Bestechungen oder Einschüchterungen zu verhindern. Die Regierungspartei kann die Stimmabgaben der Bevölkerung nicht beeinflussen.
column6: La decisión de los votantes es confidencial, para impedir que alguien intimide o soborne a los votantes. El partido gobernante no puede influir en los votos de la gente.

column2: The candidate with the most votes wins.
column3: Le candidat qui obtient le plus de voix l'emporte.
column4: Der Kandidat mit den meisten Stimmen gewinnt.
column6: Gana el candidato con más votos.

column2: The Jefferson Method is a highest averages method for allocating seats.
column3: La méthode de Jefferson correspond à la méthode des moyennes les plus hautes pour attribuer des sièges.
column4: Die Jefferson-Methode ist eine Methode der höchsten Querschnittswerte zur Zuteilung der Sitze.
column6: El método Jefferson es un método de asignación de escaños basado en medias superiores.

column2: The percentage of votes that groups of candidates obtain in elections equals the percentage of seats they receive
column3: Le pourcentage de voix que les groupes de candidats obtiennent lors des élections correspondent au pourcentage de sièges qu'ils reçoivent.
column4: Der Prozentsatz an Stimmen, den Kandidatengruppen bei Wahlen erzielen, ist gleich dem Prozentsatz an Sitzen, den sie erhalten.
column6: El porcentaje de votos obtenido por los grupos en las elecciones equivale al de escaños que reciben.

column2: All adult males must serve in the military.
column3: All adult males must serve in the military.
column4: All adult males must serve in the military.
column6: All adult males must serve in the military.

column2: Conscripts are drafted for four years.
column3: Conscripts are drafted for four years.
column4: Conscripts are drafted for four years.
column6: Conscripts are drafted for four years.

column2: Conscripts are drafted for two years.
column3: Conscripts are drafted for two years.
column4: Conscripts are drafted for two years.
column6: Conscripts are drafted for two years.

column2: Conscripts are drafted for one year.
column3: Conscripts are drafted for one year.
column4: Conscripts are drafted for one year.
column6: Conscripts are drafted for one year.

column2: Racism is the norm and minorities are constrained by blatant legal requirements, relegating them to second-class status.

column1: jim_crow_desc;"Jim Crow" laws, laws that target and act against minorities without explicitly mentioning them, are instituted in place of overtly racist policies.

column2: Legislation targeting minorities is theoretically illegal," but de facto racism and segregation exist in many facets of society under so-called ""separate but equal"" doctrine.

isolationism_desc;We shall interact with no other nations;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
interactive;Interactive;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
interactive_desc;We can ignore the rest of the world no longer;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,

punishment;Retribution;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
punishment_desc;An eye for an eye, no less;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
rehabilitation;Rehabilitation;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
rehabilitation_desc;The concepts of mercy and parole;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
separatist;Separatist;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
separatist_uh;Separatists have abandoned all attempts at national improvement. They only want independence, and will vote against all reforms.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
subordinate;Subordinate;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
subordinate_uh;These are slaves who are compliant and willing to work with the system. They are unlikely to rebel, but contribute nothing to the country's political system.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
insubordinate;Insubordinate;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
insubordinate_uh;These are slaves who are rebellious and unwilling to obey their owners, but even so contribute nothing to the country's political system.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
social_liberal;Social Liberal;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
social_liberal_uh;The 'New Liberals', as they are sometimes called, are a new breed of liberals who are in favor of both political as well as social reform.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,
agrarianism;Agrarianism;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
agrarianism_l;Agrarianism;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
agrarianism_desc;A social philosophy which believes rural life is superior to urban life. Factories and industrialization of all kinds are to be discouraged.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
remove_leader_title;Remove the First Minister;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
remove_leader_desc;Our beloved monarch does not fancy the current First Minister. Give him the sack and find another!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
expert_diplomat;Expert Diplomat;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
expert_diplomat_desc;Our leader is an expert in the art of diplomacy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
successful_industrialist;Successful Industrialist;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
successful_industrialist_desc;Our leader is a wealthy industrialist skilled in matters of business and finance.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
ivory_tower_intellectual;Ivory Tower Intellectual;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
ivory_tower_intellectual_desc;Our leader hails from the ranks of the intelligentsia, possessing a superior education.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
man_of_the_people;Man of the People;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
man_of_the_people_desc;Our leader is charismatic, and has a way of connecting with our country's people that few understand.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
landed_gentleman;Landed Gentleman;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
landed_gentleman_desc;Our leader hails from the ranks of the landed gentry, a man of breeding who is familiar with our country's aristocracy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
military_man;Military Man;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
military_man_desc;Our leader has a significant military background, and is familiar with the needs of our armed forces.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
lord_admiral;Lord Admiral;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
lord_admiral_desc;Our leader has a significant naval background, and is familiar with the needs of our country's navy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
raving_loon;Raving Loon;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
raving_loon_desc;To put it politely, we will be fortunate if our leader does not cause the country considerable harm. Many consider him a lunatic.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
luddite;Luddite;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
luddite_desc;Our leader is no friend of progress and technology, favoring traditionalism over industrial development.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
great_statesman;Great Statesman;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
great_statesman_desc;Our leader is an able speaker and a fine statesman, respected by other world leaders.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
backroom_boy;Backroom Boy;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
backroom_boy_desc;Our leader hails from the ranks of the bureaucracy, possessing a way of ensuring the country's administration is run smoothly.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
great_reformer;Great Reformer;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
great_reformer_desc;A champion of reform, our leader is seen as someone who can enact significant change in our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
gauche_buffoon;Gauche Buffoon;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
gauche_buffoon_desc;For the love of God, don't let our leader interact with foreign dignitaries. He has, shall we say, a facility for saying the wrong thing at the wrong time.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,
administrative_genius;Administrative Genius;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
administrative_genius_desc;Under our leader's guidance, the country's bureaucracy has never run more efficiently. Nothing escapes his notice.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
visionary_thinker;Visionary Thinker;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
visionary_thinker_desc;Our leader is a true visionary, and under his guidance we shall almost certainly see great leaps in technological progress.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
competent_placeholder;Competent Placeholder;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
competent_placeholder_desc;Little good can be said about our leader. Fortunately, little bad can be said about him as well.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
imperious_autocrat;Imperious Autocrat;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
imperious_autocrat_desc;No-one challenges our leader, for any reason. That said, he's quite impressive.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,
prince_of_terror;Prince of Terror;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
prince_of_terror_desc;Woe betide anyone or any nation that gets in the way of our leader's ambition.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
efficient_sociopath;Efficient Sociopath;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
efficient_sociopath_desc;The country has never run more smoothly than under our leader's guidance. Everyone agrees. Just ask them. They're all nodding and smiling, aren't they?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
pig_headed_isolationist;Pig-Headed Isolationist;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
pig_headed_isolationist_desc;Our leader is determined to keep our country isolated, favoring unquestioning adherence to tradition over all else.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
ambitious_union_boss;Ambitious Union Boss;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
ambitious_union_boss_desc;Our leader hails from the ranks of the blue-collar unions, a man who has worked his way up through the ranks... right to the very top.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
dour_economist;Dour Economist;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,
dour_economist_desc;Our leader has a penchant for numbers and economics, even if he isn't particularly good with people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
AIREASON_NEGATIVE_RELATIONS;Insufficent Relations;;Insufficent Beziehungen;;;;;;;;x;;;
